nodes.text: The Shipwright's Tools was a relic of the planet Makeb kept at the Tarlam City Archives. The tools were significant because they were made by the first colonists who settled on the planet from the material dismantled from their ships. During the Conquest of Makeb in 3638 BBY, archivist Varus attempted to save the tools from the mercenary-ridden archives before departing the planet on the Ark.
